channel.title: (PI) -Sorry an error occured- (317)
channel.description: Hello there, I am facing an issue with my Mac. I'm trying to run my client that I'm working on, first of all as I have mentioned in my "Post" Before, that I am getting error connecting to server, that's not fixed yet. However, I am facing yet another issue. Old Post: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,669971.0.html Here's the problem I am facing; Screenshot: http://prntscr.com/6wis32 Here's the error when I try running the client; [CODE] Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:5064) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4846) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [/CODE] Does anybody know what it means? I have the cache set at the right place, Name is correct and it's assigned to; User.home Firewall is off, ports are open, nothing blocking anything.. Any help at all is greatly appreciated.

item.title: (PI) -Sorry an error occured- (317)
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Hello there, I am facing an issue with my Mac.
I’m trying to run my client that I’m working on, first of all as I have mentioned in my “Post” Before, that I am getting error connecting to server, that’s not fixed yet. However, I am facing yet another issue.
Old Post: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,669971.0.html
Here’s the problem I am facing; Screenshot: http://prntscr.com/6wis32
Here’s the error when I try running the client;

Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:5064) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4846) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Does anybody know what it means?
I have the cache set at the right place, Name is correct and it’s assigned to; User.home
Firewall is off, ports are open, nothing blocking anything…
Any help at all is greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
